title: How do you counter fiddle E in ARAM
body: {{champion:9}} dark wind  is the most annoying spell ever in a map like aram. even if u dodge that spells it will bounce back and forth any tips how to avoid it?

replies.body:
Get some MR.

You can only block the silence once with things like Banshees, so if it gets cast on a small number of targets within close proximity, you can't avoid the silence (even with Sivir or the like).
Stay in fountain or 10 teemos away from your team
